metadata.title: CVE-2021-20201 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in spice in versions before 0.14.92. A DoS tool might make it easier for remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) by performing many renegotiations within a single connection.

notes.note: leosilva> Issues that touch python_modules for spice in Xenial need to be addressed in spice-protocol.

criterions.comment: spice package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
